attributes.action: Install cctv in every mosque or church in Britain.
attributes.additional_details: What is being said inside places of worship is unknown and it can promote hate / extremism. Religion is the cause of terrorism
attributes.background: Make it a legal requirement for any place of worship to have CCTV installed (sound and video) to prevent extremist speech.

rejection.details: We're not sure whether you want the law to require CCTV in all places of worship, or just in mosques and churches. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
